physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: "#306 Orlinsky Grocery." Handwritten notes on back of photograph: "#306 Orlinsky Grocery" and "Orlinsky Grocery, corner 8th & Mariposa."

mods.abstract: Exterior of Orlinsky's Cash Grocery and Meat Market. There is a large Quaker Oats advertisement on the side of the building and three people are standing between two trees in front of the entrance. The grocery store was at 8th and Mariposa in Denver, Colorado.

name.namePart: Orlinsky's Cash Grocery and Meat Market
